definitions.definition: The quality of being forgetful ; proneness to let slip from the mind.
Loss of remembrance or recollection ; a ceasing to remember; oblivion .
Failure to bear in mind ; careless omission ; inattention .

main_definition: The quality of being forgetful ; proneness to let slip from the mind.
secondary_definitions: Loss of remembrance or recollection ; a ceasing to remember; oblivion .
Failure to bear in mind ; careless omission ; inattention .
